note: I’m a weekly columnist - Different Drummer - for 36 years so far. Bay Area newspaper. Mostly humor. I was a high school journalism and English teacher for 30 years, taught tech at several colleges, now retired. I paint with oils and have about 25. No one has ever seen them. I make colorful outdoor miniature tables with milkpaint. I give them away. I hike and fish and camp and stuff. Dig the Blues. Do their cruise.

fields.name: Columnist - Different Drummer humor mostly
fields.value: I am a retired schoolteacher after 30 years of service, teaching high school, journalism English, plus teaching technology classes at a couple of local colleges

fields.name: Artist
fields.value: I do oil paintings for my entertainment. I’ve never been on display and I have never tried to sell one. I would miss it if it was gone.
